context.note: The following procedure will remove from your system. Please ensure that all valuable data stored in the install folder is saved to another location prior to performing this procedure.

step.cmd: Backup all valuable data from the installation folder.

choices.choice: On Windows use the appropriate uninstaller shortcut provided with your OS.
On Mac OS X and Unix manually delete the installation folder and all its contents.

step.cmd: If you want to remove the user preferences that were configured in the Preferences dialog, also remove the following folder:

choices.choice: %APPDATA%\com.oxygenxml %APPDATA%\com.oxygenxml.author %APPDATA%\com.oxygenxml.developer%APPDATA%\com.oxygenxml.diff%APPDATA%\com.syncrosvnClient on Windows (usually %APPDATA% has the value [user-home-dir]\Application Data);

Library/Preferences/com.oxygenxml
Library/Preferences/com.oxygenxml.author
Library/Preferences/com.oxygenxml.developer
Library/Preferences/com.oxygenxml.diff
Library/Preferences/com.syncrosvnClient of the user home folder on Mac OS X.
